title: [Large-scale] Designing Student Engagement Strategies in Online Higher Education Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and educational management experience
context.additional_context: For advanced professional learners in managerial/leadership roles in language education, a program to experience generative AI's educational applicability in simulation/VR environments and develop student engagement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of generative AI on psychological basic needs such as autonomy, competence, and relatedness, and apply this to instructional design.
Learners can present ethical issues and solutions arising when using generative AI tools through simulations as project outcomes.
Learners can design an AI-based personalized feedback system in VR environments to develop strategies that improve language learners' engagement by over 20%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
